titles.title: A bill to limit the amount of funds available to the Aeronautics Research Mission Directorate of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration during fiscal year 2007 and fiscal years thereafter.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: 9/25/2006--Introduced. Limits to $724 million the aggregate funds available to the Aeronautics Research Mission Directorate of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) during FY2007 and following fiscal years.
